SocialMediaPosting.headline: Dr. Mary Catherine Reljac’s Story - Pittsburgh Educator - TodayPGH
SocialMediaPosting.text:
“One day, I hope that all are inspired to help others, to be compassionate, and to make a difference in their corner of the world…”

– Dr. Mary Catherine Reljac, Superintendent of Schools @FCASD @PittEducation @CarlowU @IUPedu https://www.todaypgh.com/story/2020/inspired-help-others-compassionate-make-difference-their-corner-world/
